languages.text: "Хм. Странно, странно. Кто бы мог так смотреть на него в его же доме? Какой-нибудь мимопролетающий сервочереп? А может, это и вовсе был бред умирающего?"
"Hmph. That is strange. Who could have looked at him like that in his own home? Some errant servo-skull that was passing by? Maybe it was nothing more than a dying man's delusion?"
languages.original_text: "Хм. Странно, странно. Кто бы мог так смотреть на него в его же доме? Какой-нибудь мимопролетающий сервочереп? А может, это и вовсе был бред умирающего?"

traits.locale_text: "Hmph. That is strange. Who could have looked at him like that in his own home? Some errant servo-skull that was passing by? Maybe it was nothing more than a dying man's delusion?"
"Hmph. That is strange. Who could have looked at him like that in his own home? Some errant servo-skull that was passing by? Maybe it was nothing more than a dying man's delusion?"
"Hmph. That is strange. Who could have looked at him like that in his own home? Some errant servo-skull that was passing by? Maybe it was nothing more than a dying man's delusion?"
"Hmph. That is strange. Who could have looked at him like that in his own home? Some errant servo-skull that was passing by? Maybe it was nothing more than a dying man's delusion?"
"Hmph. That is strange. Who could have looked at him like that in his own home? Some errant servo-skull that was passing by? Maybe it was nothing more than a dying man's delusion?"

languages.text: “嗯，这可就怪了，有谁会跑到他自己的家里盯着他看呢？是某个出了故障的伺服头骨刚好路过吗？或者说，那不过是将死之人的错觉而已？”
languages.original_text: "Hmph. That is strange. Who could have looked at him like that in his own home? Some errant servo-skull that was passing by? Maybe it was nothing more than a dying man's delusion?"

traits.locale_text: “嗯，这可就怪了，有谁会跑到他自己的家里盯着他看呢？是某个出了故障的伺服头骨刚好路过吗？或者说，那不过是将死之人的错觉而已？”

languages.text: «Mmm. Extraño. ¿Quién podría haberle mirado así en su propio hogar? ¿Un servocráneo que pasara por allí? Puede que no fuera más que el delirio de un moribundo».
languages.original_text: "Hmph. That is strange. Who could have looked at him like that in his own home? Some errant servo-skull that was passing by? Maybe it was nothing more than a dying man's delusion?"

traits.locale_text: «Mmm. Extraño. ¿Quién podría haberle mirado así en su propio hogar? ¿Un servocráneo que pasara por allí? Puede que no fuera más que el delirio de un moribundo».

languages.text: 「ふむ…妙ですね。彼の自宅で、一体誰が彼をそんな目で見ていたのでしょう？通りすがりの故障したサーヴォスカルでしょうか？それとも、死にゆく男の妄想に過ぎないとか？」
languages.original_text: "Hmph. That is strange. Who could have looked at him like that in his own home? Some errant servo-skull that was passing by? Maybe it was nothing more than a dying man's delusion?"

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ…妙ですね。彼の自宅で、一体誰が彼をそんな目で見ていたのでしょう？通りすがりの故障したサーヴォスカルでしょうか？それとも、死にゆく男の妄想に過ぎないとか？」

languages.text: "Hmpf. Das ist merkwürdig. Wer sollte ihn in seinem eigenen Zuhause dergestalt beobachtet haben? Ein verirrter Servoschädel auf der Durchreise? Vielleicht war es nur eine Wahnvorstellung eines Sterbenden?"
languages.original_text: "Hmph. That is strange. Who could have looked at him like that in his own home? Some errant servo-skull that was passing by? Maybe it was nothing more than a dying man's delusion?"

traits.locale_text: "Hmpf. Das ist merkwürdig. Wer sollte ihn in seinem eigenen Zuhause dergestalt beobachtet haben? Ein verirrter Servoschädel auf der Durchreise? Vielleicht war es nur eine Wahnvorstellung eines Sterbenden?"

languages.text: « Hmm. Voilà qui est étrange. Qui aurait bien pu le regarder ainsi dans sa propre maison ? Un servocrâne errant de passage ? Ce n'était peut-être que les délires d'un homme sur son lit de mort. »
languages.original_text: "Hmph. That is strange. Who could have looked at him like that in his own home? Some errant servo-skull that was passing by? Maybe it was nothing more than a dying man's delusion?"

traits.locale_text: « Hmm. Voilà qui est étrange. Qui aurait bien pu le regarder ainsi dans sa propre maison ? Un servocrâne errant de passage ? Ce n'était peut-être que les délires d'un homme sur son lit de mort. »

languages.text: "Hımm... Çok tuhaf. Kendi evinde ona kim öyle bakacaktı ki? Boşta gezen bir hizmelet mi? Ölüm döşeğindeki bir adamın hezeyanları olmasın sakın?"
languages.original_text: "Hmph. That is strange. Who could have looked at him like that in his own home? Some errant servo-skull that was passing by? Maybe it was nothing more than a dying man's delusion?"

traits.locale_text: "Hım... Çok tuhaf. Kendi evinde ona kim öyle bakacaktı ki? Kapının önünden geçen serseri bir hizmelet mi? Belki son nefesini bekleyen bir adamın heyezanlarından başka bir şey değildir."
